version_description:
- Added wind direction and wind speed forecast
- Added a world cities pollution ranking
- Fixed weather forecast issues

- Widget
- Worldwide ranking of most polluted cities
- iPad support
- Nearest station selection improvement
- Description of AQI forecast thresholds
- Visual improvements
- Easier to skip the registration process if needed

- Support for indoor air quality monitors
- Better and faster widget
- Faster refresh rate
- Improved maps
- Improved notifications
- Added 500 more cities to the global air pollution coverage

- Extended 7-day air quality & weather forecast
- Coverage expanded for 10,000+ locations in 80+ countries
- AirVisual Earth air pollution modelization viewable for real-time global PM2.5
- Enhanced visual design
- Improved features contra

- Polish language fixes
- Share your air with a picture!
- Widget improvement
- Readability enhancements
- Display the main pollutant and its concentration

- Track your air quality on your Apple Watch
- UI and performance enhancements

- Apple Watch complication
- UI and performance enhancements

- Google sign-in
- Discover AirVisual Community’s contributors
- Webcams to see your city’s smog: Bangkok, Dubai, Tokyo, Seoul & more
- UI / UX improvements for better readability

- Discover AirVisual Community’s contributors
- Webcams to see your city’s smog: Bangkok, Dubai, Tokyo, Seoul & more
- UI / UX improvements for better readability

•New personal exposure dashboard based on the WHO guidelines to track exposure to polluted air
•Support for Apple Watch OS 5 and “Infograph” face complications
•Performance improvements
